alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. John The Baptist, central Ascension, St. James, northwestern St. Charles, south central Livingston, north central Lafourche and northeastern Assumption Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sorrento to Reserve. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Reserve, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, Edgard, South Vacherie, Paincourtville, Convent, North Vacherie, Garyville, Wallace, Raceland, Chackbay, Belle Rose and Killona. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 179 and 206. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension
